name: insight_type
description: Type of numerical insight (e.g., 'Earnings Summary', 'Financial Health')

name: generation_date
description: Date when the insight was generated

name: summary_text
description: Generated natural language summary from numerical data

name: embedding_id
description: Reference ID to the embedding in Vertex AI Vector Search (UUID)

name: source_metrics
description: List of financial metrics used for this insight

name: ingestion_timestamp
description: Timestamp when the record was ingested
